channel.title: server on NakSquad
channel.description: Recent content in server on NakSquad

item.title: #1 Altis Invade and Annex
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules Mods Huge Allowed Mods List Sny’s Mods HTML Events Combined Operations Friday @ 9pm Eastern/US Runs late into the night, until we run out of players Required Mods for event Any allowed mods Event rules If you are joining the event you must be in the event channel in teamspeak. You must follow the event commanders orders during the event.

item.title: NAK#2 Public Modded Zeus
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules Please complete the Zeus Survey for every zeus mission to take part in. It helps to improve the quality of the missions and the enjoyment of the servers for everyone. \ This server has required mods. Required Mods (last updated 08-26-2023) Collection -or- HTML Optional Mods Collection -or- HTML Sny’s Recommended Mods HTML Events NakTac Event Days and Time to be Determined Required Mods for event Required Mods for event TBD Test mods Event rules There are special rules for this event There are qualifications to join the unit.

item.title: NAK#3 Tanoa Quicksilver
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules Mods Huge Allowed Mods List Events Tactical Tuesday Tuesdays @ 7pm Eastern/US Runs until server restart at 9pm Required Mods for event Any allowed mods Please do not run RHS as it breaks sound for others on this server. Event rules If you are joining the event you must be in the event channel in teamspeak. You must follow the event commanders orders during the event.

item.title: #4 Public Vanilla Zeus
item.description: See the main server for server description and rules When joining from the launcher click the “Keep Current Loaded Mods” button not the top one. Please complete the Zeus Survey for every zeus mission to take part in. It helps to improve the quality of the missions and the enjoyment of the servers for everyone. Mods Huge Allowed Mods List Events NAK Ops Saturday @ 5pm Eastern/US Runs 2-3 hours depending on the size and complexity of the mission.

item.title: General Info
item.description: Some of the things you can expect. Voice Communication Your microphone must be well adjusted and you must be able to communicate clearly. If you are in an environment with a lot of background noise, you may be required to use push-to-talk. Eating is not allowed during our operations, it is only allowed while your microphone is muted in the following situations: Spectator Pre-mission Post-debrief Roleplay This is a light roleplay unit.

item.title: #n SnyOps
item.description: Who let you in here? How do you know about this place? SECURITY!\ This server is completely experimental and is subject to change at any time. However, this does not mean there are no rules. See the main server for server description and rules This is where I will be testing new mods and missions. Mods (last updated 08-26-2023) HTML Events none scheduled. NAK#n SnyOps
